verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let the poor man say
I am rich in him.
Let the lost man say
I am found in him.
Oh, let the river flow.
Let the blind man say
I can see again.
Let the dead man say
I am born again.
Oh, let the river flow.
Oh, let the river flow.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Let the river flow, let the river flow.
Holy Spirit come, move in power.
Let the river flow.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Let the river flow, Let the river flow.
Let the river flow, Let the river flow.
Let the river flow, Let the river flow.
Let the river flow.
